League 1
PSG: Leonardo clarifies the situation of Cavani and Thiago Silva
At the end of the contract in June, the two former club still do not know what their future will be.
07 Nov 2019, 11:40 by Thomas Rassouli



The weeks pass but neither Thiago Silva nor Edinson Cavani have settled their situation at the moment. If the first held last night in defense, the second had once again had to start on the bench, preceded in the hierarchy by Mauro Icardi. At the end of the contract in June, it does not seem obvious for either of them that an extension is necessary.




"We will decide together"




Edinson Cavani + 11 ðŸ“·Credit Photo - Icon Sport

In front of the press and at the microphone of RMC Sport, Leonardo was questioned about the situation of his two executives, and remains evasive on the subject, even if it is time for reflection at this time of the season.
"We're going to decide together, it's important, we should not have any doubt, give a contract because they have done a lot for the club." explains the sports director. "We have to be clear with them all the time and I think that's the way it is, we're going to move forward and we're going to see how it's going during the season, there's no timing, the timing will be our feeling, our conversation, and we will decide together one thing or the other.
